lines: Sorry, you're still too young for this experience.  Come back later.
Sorry, you're too old for this experience.

You and your friends are in the living room listening to albums, talking about guys and stuff, when your mom comes breezing through the door, asking if you would like some "milk and cookies." You can hear your friends snickering
Because your family relations are good, you tolerate the embarrassment well, being careful not to hurt her feelings.
You are absolutely mortified. You clench your teeth and tell her to please leave you alone.
Because you are somewhat hostile (your Gentleness characteristic is low), you exaggerate your discomfort by saying, "PLEASE, can you LEAVE US A-LONE." Your mom gets upset.
